website_summaries.verdict: This litter pan is built for up to two cats. Lid is easy to remove, and the pan comes in fun colors.
pros: A favorite among cats, even  finicky ones
Customers appreciate the high edges that prevent litter from spilling out
Comes in seven colors that take away from the fact it's a litter box
cons: Lid must be removed to scoop up litter

customer_reviews.title: Litter box... or house.
customer_reviews.text: It works really great... but my cat liked it so much I decided not to use it as a litter box and let her use it as a little house instead. It looks like I'll be buying a new litter box.
customer_reviews.author: SUANST

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a cat that tends to back up to pee then don’t get this, the seal between the top and bottom allow it to leak out of the box constantly. So pissed about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This box is not what they tell you for measurement ...
customer_reviews.text: This box is not what they tell you for measurement. It said 25 x20 or 24 × 19. Not true. I have a 22 × 16.38 and this new litter box will fit right in the old one. So there is no way that it is 24 x 19. Don't get it if your looking for a big litter box
customer_reviews.author: raquel tebo

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have multiple cats, but not the room for multiple boxes.
customer_reviews.text: With two cats, I have always tried to follow the rule of one litter box per cat and then one extra. However my current living situation doesn't allow me the space for three littler boxes. The size of this one is a wonderful solution and is spacious enough so that the cats can easily move around and do what they need to do. I have also never liked covered boxes, but with the clear cover it is almost as if it doesn't have one and the opening is large enough so that it is possible to scoop without removing the cover.
customer_reviews.author: aldnikki6

customer_reviews.title: Great for large cats
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these litter boxes when they were sold at Petco. This new version comes in a choice of colors other than the light grey I already had and has a colored plastic reinforcing strip around the opening. I have a 16 lb. male cat who is so large that he sometimes pees over the edge of a standard open box. This jumbo covered box solves that problem. The cats, I believe, like the clear top. The box opens and closes easily and washes easily too. Perfect for people with large cats and multi cat households.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe J. Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Great for large cat
customer_reviews.text: My very large cat is able to use this with ease and gives him enough privacy without being closed in.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Throw out your old box. You will love this one!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I never review but had to tell all with kitties that this box is GREAT. I have two cats, one that pees in the corner of the box (where it sticks) and one that pees high (and out the back of the covered box). This morning no pee out the box and no corners to dig in! It is roomy and rounded. I also bought a liner for the first time. Hoping no issues with them digging into the liner, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Christen Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good for kitten
customer_reviews.text: I can say I like the color, this is cheaply made, the clasps are very hard to get because the box itself is warped. This easy on and off cover for cleaning seriously... I can see trying to unsnap this at 5 am waking everyone up in the house with the loud clasps you have to fight with to close it. Back to the old cat boxes, This is the most expensive box and so very cheap for the I money spent. Shipping it back today. No way will any of my cats use or fit in this so I will stick to their big boxes I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Meeps

customer_reviews.title: Over priced, cheap and hard to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: Worse kitty litter box I ever purchased. My cats hated it. Way too large and the unit isn’t square which makes it difficult to scoop out the waste. The top is a nightmare to put on. Way over priced as well. I ended up heaving it in the last trash pickup.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Wyrwas

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not close on all sides, urine leaks out
customer_reviews.text: Lid does not close on all sides at the same time because it fits improperly. Leaks urine if your cat tends to stand and pee down side of box. Not useful for the problem I am having.
customer_reviews.author: S. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Lids warped, but cats love - easy clean. Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I bought a blue one about a year ago. The lid did not fully fit and the snaps don't grab well. I thought I got a dud, but I love the size and color and my cat's loved it. It is for some strange reason easier to clean than my other cat boxes. So I bought another in purple. This one again has the same issue with the cover. It's not shaped right or something and takes quite a bit if manipulation to get just one snap to clip on... so it appears this is common with these cat boxes. Though my cats love them and I love the cleaning...I really wish the covers worked like they should.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa VanValkenburgh

customer_reviews.title: Packing is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Came cracked. Was going to request a refund but decided to just make it work with hot glue. Won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Deniz P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at the beginning to spend so much money on a litter pan, but oh wow! What a litter pan! Definitely worth it! I love the round edges so much. My cat always pees in the corner and it was so hard to scoop it from the rectangular one. And it has a wide opening so I don't need to remove the lid all the time for scooping. P.s. I saw a reviewer that says to check for missing pieces. All the pieces are in the bag and box. Don't throw away the package before looking for all the pieces. Also comes with a small bag of 2 extra side clips
customer_reviews.author: Meser

customer_reviews.title: Leaks if you have a high peeing cat!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a hard time finding a litter box that does not leak for my "high peeing" cat. I was so hopeful that the Petphabet Jumbo Hooded box would be high enough that this would not be a problem. The first time she used the box her pee immediately leaked out where the lid latches on to the box. UGH! Why can't someone make a lid that comes down low enough on the INSIDE of the box so the pee leaks into the box and not out?!!?
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good litter box. It doesn't leak, which is the most important thing to me. The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't have a flip top lid on top, so that you can scoop easier. You have to take the whole lid off. But great colors! I have 1 Maine Coon that doesn't really fit. Even though he tries. See picture. But it is roomy for my 4 regular sized cats.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Cover is weak plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute litter box (we got the bright green) and our cat immediately hopped in and gave it a try. Our cat is young and medium sized. . . not too big. The box size is generous for our cat. He does like to jump on top of everything- - from tables to chairs. I would assume most cats do. The problem with this box is he hopped on the top (the clear plastic cover) and it it broke. A large chunk of the top broke into the litter and created a huge hole. We only had it a few days when this happened. The plastic top should definitely be more durable for this price.
customer_reviews.author: GA506

customer_reviews.title: finally found something that works!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: my biggest problem has always been litter all over the floors. I have one cat in particular who hangs outside the litter box to dig in the litter to his satisfaction, then does his business and goes outside the box to cover it. What a mess he makes! he doesn't do that with this box. I guess because the entrance is higher off the ground than most. Anyways I ordered 1 to try it and I have since bought 2 more. I also like that material the litter box is made of. It does not absorb the smell of the waste and is very easy to clean and maintain. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MS JUDI ROY

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this litter box, especially for the price. Right out of the box, it’s missing a latch, top doesn’t fit the bottom and no handle on top. This is going back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box!
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall. (Some say it looks like a large Tupperware cake container) . My 2 cats use it comfortably and I think the clear upper portion is a brilliant feature! It’s fairly easy to do a cursory dirty litter scoop out without the removing the entire lid, but I do remove it for a thorough cleaning. The whole unit can be hosed off too- that’s a good feature. The lid snaps are sometimes tricky to secure, but it hasn’t been a big problem. The color is wonderful and is as shown (I have the lime green). Overall, I love this litter box!!
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: It's Jumbo All Right!
customer_reviews.text: Very large, with high walls and an easy to remove top makes for a great litter box for our cats. This replaced a smaller covered box that our larger male cat had a little difficulty with - now there are no more accidents and no litter spilled outside of the box. There are four clips that hold the top cover on, but I only lock the front 2 and that has been fine. Came with extra clips just in case - but I have not needed to replace any yet. Like the clear top, colorful base, and large opening. Would highly recommend and am glad I spent a little more to get this jumbo one.
customer_reviews.author: tab2000

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best.
customer_reviews.text: The brilliant colors of these litterboxes drew me in, but really, they're excellent litterboxes! - Locks close well and the box comes with a spare - High-back walls and sides eliminate possibility of a cat peeing over the edge of the bottom - Easily accommodates geriatric cats, tiny cats, and large cats (25lb+) - Plastic is durable and doesn't dry out and crack over time - No swinging door! They can get stuck and block your cat from getting inside - it happened to me I've had cats for years and worked as a cat shelter volunteer. This is by far my favorite litterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for only two days but the results are in. Very large, plenty of room for the cat to turn around even though mine is still only a few months old kitten. He used it immediately after it was set up with the old, mostly clean litter. The opening is large enough to do most cleaning through it; for a more thorough cleaning the top can be easily removed. Latchining it back on took some fumbling, but maybe it is just me. It came with two extra latches, they seem to be pretty fragile. I'm very satisfied with it as it eliminated 95% of the mess I had with the open previous litter box
customer_reviews.author: mountain Bill

customer_reviews.title: ... never seen a litter box that I thought looked pretty. This box is actually great looking
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen a litter box that I thought looked pretty. This box is actually great looking. It is a nice big size. As soon as it was unpacked a cat jumped in and slept in it. It is now his napping spot. I may just put a blanket in it for him and order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Booker

customer_reviews.title: Why is this so darn expensive?
customer_reviews.text: I figured with all the raving reviews that there must be something special about this litter box. Especially for the price. It is just a litter box. There is nothing special. It's not high quality, does nothing special and doesn't even have a handle on top. Don't waste all this cash. Spend half this cost or less and get a box that is either the same or equally usable. I'd return it but I can't imagine they would take back a used litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Jum

customer_reviews.title: FAKE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: Makes a big mess and very hard to clean at the bottom after you dump out all the cat litter. I sent it back! FAKE REVIEWS!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Has cut odor considerably
customer_reviews.text: I like this box a lot, so I'll get the thing I don't like out of the way. It is VERY difficult to get it to lock. The top sits on the box just fine, but getting more than one lock fastened at the same time is just luck. They just don't line up right. However, it is huge, my elderly cats who haven't used a covered box before are fine with it, it keeps litter in and doesn't allow for "missing" the box and going over the edge, and it looks better than a plain box. I just put the lid back on, lock whichever locks cooperate, and so far they haven't pushed the lid off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box, truly JUMBO
customer_reviews.text: I bought this litter box b/c my female has started standing to pee instead of squatting (almost as if she's spraying, but she's urinating). As a result, her urine was leaking out of the other box all over my carpet! This litter box is sooo much better! It's still not a perfect air tight seal, but 95% of the urine hits the "tall back wall" now instead of leaking. Also, it is truly jumbo size!! Some of the other ones say they are large, but I don't find them to be bigger than average. This one is huge! And the colors are fun, I bought the purple and the color is true to the advertisement!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cat box!
customer_reviews.text: So I have had cats all my life (and I’m not young) and this one beats them all! Great quality and love the clear lid and so do my kitties. The cats aren’t reluctant at all to enter this box and seem to do much better not having to go into a dark “cave” covered box. I also love the fact that I can clearly see when it needs cleaning/scooping without having to remove the lid. I do agree that having a curved design inside the box are a bit challenging to scoop, but the other features far outweigh this one drawback. (Wouldn’t it be great if the manufacturer included a rounded edge scooper with this litter box?).
customer_reviews.author: SuziB686

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and size.
customer_reviews.text: My former feral cat loves using this because she can see outside the box while she is inside the box. She is accustomed to digging before she uses the litter box as well as covering after she is done. Because of the lid, she no longer gets mounds of litter outside the box. I love that part. I love it’s size — plenty of room for a bigger kitty. I love that it coordinates with the color of the room (what woman wouldn’t?). It does not eliminate the odor, however, and that is the negative.
customer_reviews.author: A Friend

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't order this when I read some of the less flattering reviews, but I love this cat box! I haven't used a hooded litter box in a long time because one of my cats was a Maine Coon and huge (22pds). He passed away last year, so I decided to get one for my remaining kitty to keep the dust down (plus it is much more attractive). This cat is 15 years old and is 16pds. I got the Jumbo and it is perfect. The large entryway makes it easy to scoop without removing the lid, and my cat likes it (he sometimes sticks his head out while using it).
customer_reviews.author: MELINDA CROCKER

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats who pee high up sides of box
customer_reviews.text: High sides, clear lid. One of my dear darlings loves to fling litter everywhere while figuring out just where to go. Then, on top of that, she starts peeing at a normal low squat, and gradually stands up during the pee! This box is great, as between the high sides and back, & the clear cover, it has eliminated all of the overspill issues. I think the pee lumps may even slide off the plastic bottom a bit easier than my other one. Overall sturdy, and great quality! I don't use the clips to lock the top and bottom together, but they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H

customer_reviews.title: This costs 5 bucks
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I wasted so much money on this thing. It's very wobbly so I decided to see either is better with litter in it. Still wobbly. I have food containers stronger than this. The top doesn't align so only 2 clasps hooked on. It came scratched and inside it had white bruises - from being shipped. Imagine a cat clawing inside of it?? It's designed badly. I can already tell litter will scatter been the lid and the body. Sending this overpriced bs back
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: No more sand everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It has only been a few days since we set this up but so far so good. We had given our cat a top entry litter box initially and it seemed great at first, but noticed later that sometimes he’d step in his waste and when he’d fling himself up to get out, said waste would fling with him. As soon as we set this one up, our cat immediately stepped inside, did a 1 AND 2 and calmly stepped out without any issues. I am thrilled. I knocked one star off because the top doesn’t really fit the bottom half perfectly. It takes effort to lock it in. Not a big deal though. Overall we are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Smoon

customer_reviews.title: Excellt litter box!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat (and I) both love this litter box! She took to it immediately with no problems. The lid is awesome in helping that immediate post-potty smell and she loves being able to look through it while she's in there. It's super easy to clean and is great at keeping litter -inside- the box. Cute color too! I haven't had any issues at all with the clasps but they do provide extras which is awesome since some reviews said they broke off. I make sure to be gentle with them. Definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: one75

customer_reviews.title: Good Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: This box is big enough so no one's rear end hangs out the opening. The clear lid makes it easy to see any need for littler scooping. The lid goes on easily, but must be well settled on the lower portion of the box. Once the lid is settled properly it all but locks itself. You can reach in the opening to scoop, but it is just as easy to pop off the lid. Yes, there is an "express exit" button in there somewhere. Basically, this is cat and maintenance dept (littler box division) approved.
customer_reviews.author: Boggart

customer_reviews.title: Not really "jumbo."
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for our cats. Even our smallest cat has difficulty turning around in them. Also the plastic latches are difficult to engage and frequently pop off the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R. Roewert

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure my cats would take to an enclosed box, but they didn’t hesitate using it from the first. It is big enough for my 17 lb Maine Coon and my smaller ones. With its size and design, the litter box odor has been very limited. My only concern is the fastener design. It seems easy to break, but they supply extra fasteners. We’ll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Maddakat

customer_reviews.title: Lid Doesn't Latch to the Bottom
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this litter box and I like that the lid is clear so my cats can see and will actually use it. They didn't like the one with a lid they couldn't see through so they stopped using it. My only complaint (but it's a big one) is the lid won't latch to the bottom. It's defective. It's frustrating because my cats like to scratch all the way up the sides after using the box and I know it's only a matter of time before they knock the lid off since it won't latch closed. The lid also needs a handle to make it easier to lift off.
customer_reviews.author: mtamez720

customer_reviews.title: Wow, its nice but..........
customer_reviews.text: This box is giant, just what I wanted. It's very attractive but very thin. When I snapped the lid on it cracked, maybe there was a defect in the mold, at the wrong spot. Now I think I will send all three back because I am really afraid of breaking the others. I purchased this box before and I think it was thicker. I am very disappointed, I waited over a week, was happy when the boxes came and BOOM ! Dorothy
customer_reviews.author: Miss Dorothy Chage my rating to a two star

customer_reviews.title: These boxes leak if you have a high peeing cat
customer_reviews.text: I liked the clear lids, but the top didn't fit tighly over the bottom and consequently they leaked every time my cat used the box. He's a high peeing cat. My other cat kept pushing off the top, the lids don't secure very tightly. I ended up having to find a different litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The size is nice, however, there are a couple things wrong with this box. The latches are very difficult to line up and get to snap into place. The other problem I've realized is there is a lack of ventilation or filter. This turns it into a really expensive stink box and requires immediate attention any time it's used. Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Main

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for litter kickers
customer_reviews.text: My cats both, although in different ways, end up scattering tons of litter all over the place. I've been trying out tons of different litter boxes. I am thrilled with this one. The pan is deep, and the clear cover is tall and lets them kick it around all they want in the box and has drastically reduced the amount of litter that comes out of the box now. Nothing will eliminate it completely, but this box is a game changer. I don't think I'll need to try out any other boxes from now on. Plus, I love that it comes in so many colors. My cats have a purple box and we all like it!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyBunny

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Amazon keeps censoring my review attempts, but it's important for potential buyers to know what they are getting into if they buy this thing. First, it's flimsy at best. Lightweight and clearly it will not last. Second, if you like the thought of a used litter box, you know, with that broken-in look, then don't hesitate to add it to your cart. That's what I got, after all. And promptly returned. If, however, you prefer to buy a functioning, sturdy, clean, unused item, expand your search elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kokonuts

customer_reviews.title: Defected & broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was very pleased with this. However, this broke very quickly - one of the locks on the side, which prevented the box from sealing all the way. Also, the front where the seal goes around the entrance way doesn't stay in place & constantly holds pee & litter, which is gross and a pain to clean. Giving this two stars because the size if great & the see through cover made training my stubborn kitty who hates covers slightly easier.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and specs not right
customer_reviews.text: The litter box is cute. The cats love the clear lid. I have another litter box right next to this one, but it's dark in there. Now they rarely use that one. The problem is the latches don't close because they don't line up well with the flimsy bottom part. The rounded bottom and sides are pretty, but it makes it difficult to scoop. (Maybe there's a rounded scooper out there somewhere that works well with this litter box. Should be sold as a set.) Anyway, I'll keep it because my cats prefer it. They're not concerned about the practicality of it.
customer_reviews.author: Levans

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best cat litter box
customer_reviews.text: My two cats have tried multiple litter boxes and pans but they either: 1) didn't seem to like the lack of privacy of a short, open pan, or; 2) they found the box too restricting when trying to turn around to find a good spot to squat. I personally couldn't stand the mess they made all over the floor when attempting to bury their business. This box is the solution: large enough for roomy comfort, private because of the lid, deep enough to hold lots of fresh litter, keeps contained all the litter that would otherwise be all over the carpet, and is so easy to open up and clean. This is one of the best purchases I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Liz T.

customer_reviews.title: Solved two problems in one! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large Maine Coon rescue cat who is getting up there in years. Other covered litter boxes were too small, or she had difficulty getting in and out but this one is the perfect size and she has no issue getting in and out of it. I was searching for a solution that would keep our puppy out of the litter box when I stumbled on another review for this box that said they faced theirs towards the corner and that solved it. I haven't even had to do that. The dog hasn't stuck her head in the box or even investigated how to get into it at all. Two problems solved!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Broken item
customer_reviews.text: My box came in broken 😩 It looks so good and big enough for both of my kittens. It sucks that they did not package it the right way and now I have to return it and wait for the new one
customer_reviews.author: Diana Matetova

customer_reviews.title: Great Jumbo Kitty Hood
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth jumbo kitty hood I have purchased over the years. I like it because it is a clear top and I like that feature. The hooks are easy to unhook and put back, however, over time they break and the extras are , for me , impossible to replace. Nonthe the less, I love this jumbo kitty litter pan and will continue to buy them as long as I can find them with a clear top.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly B.

customer_reviews.title: great cat box
customer_reviews.text: one of my cats love to pee over the top of the cat box. This box has been wonderful. No more pee pads taped all around the walls. I was afraid she would not use it because it is enclosed but no problem. A little hard to scoop out clumps but well worth the problem. The enclosed sides keeps littler from being scatter everywhere. I also like that the top is clear so you can see when you need to scoop littler without having to remove the top. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ted B.

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I think the cats really do like the clear top. This is the most popular litterbox in our house now. I also have a Maine Coon mix (not pictured) who is quite large and has no problems fitting in there. The box does a much better job keeping the smell contained than an open-top one. I was also pleasantly surprised at the fact that poo doesn't really stick to the sides of the box. It has a sort of non-stick quality to it so you don't have to do so much scraping! We love our new box!
customer_reviews.author: Annesthesia

customer_reviews.title: The cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the larger size of this litter box. It gives my cat more room to turn around and see what's going on around her. This was important to us as we have a toddler that sometimes chases the cat and while using the litter box is the worst time. It's very easy to open and clean. We liked the offering of multiple colors to fit almost any decor. We bought the large size pan liners and have no problem with them fitting or the latches closing over them.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic litter box
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic litter box! Our 15 lb cat is a really big boy (looks even bigger with all his fluffy fur)! He had a hard time getting into a normal litter box without his butt hanging over and urine getting on the outside of the box and leaking underneath. We bought this box not knowing what to expect. The cats have no issues going inside, even though they've never had a covered box before. We can easily peek through the top and see if the litter needs changing. And, the cover helps to keep the smell contained for the most part. Will definitely be buying a second one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Author Angie Martin

customer_reviews.title: colored piece that lines the doorway keeps on falling off
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars means "it's ok." this is a $40 item made of pretty flimsy, thin, cheap plastic. I have ONE cat who uses this, and after a few weeks of her using it, the colored piece that lines the doorway keeps on falling off. it's a giant pain. while it's cool that large cats have room to bury, in my opinion it's not worth the money. it's nice that you can see through the top, the bright yellow color i got is nice as pictured, it is in fact jumbo, but it's flimsy and i can't believe the doorway piece keeps on falling off. too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: sunnydaysahead

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't block litter or smells :/
customer_reviews.text: I dunno what "easy to remove" is supposed to mean. The lid is easy to remove? Like sure, it is. The locks are finicky though, but they do lock securely. My least favorite thing about it is that it doesn't really stop the cats from kicking litter out of it when they jump out. It stops litter from spreading all around the box, but as seen in my photo they still kick plenty of litter out the front. My other least favorite thing is that it doesn't really block smells like I thought it would. If the cats don't cover their poop sometimes it reeks as much as it ever did. So whatever
customer_reviews.author: Sean Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and effective
customer_reviews.text: I got this when I found myself fostering 4 feral kittens. It's a very attractive design which I like it because the transparent lid lets me see at once if it is occupied, so I don't spook them. It's got lots of space for 2, and doesn't let the litter spill. I took off one star because (like most other covered litter trays I've had), the lid and base don't always line up very well and so the latches don't always engage very easily at first. That's annoying but not a major problem provided that I'm careful to check that they are secure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for big girl.
customer_reviews.text: I have two rescue cats and they are both 14-15 lbs. My boy Julius is a high pee'er and will always sit and do his business butt facing opening and with my old litter box he would actually pee over the edge at the opening. This one is high enough on the bottom part (7 ") so there is no longer pee outside the box. Furthermore it is quite roomy and high ceiling for my girl Caroline to sit up comfortably and do her thing. Easy to clean and I love all the cute colors it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Scarab

customer_reviews.title: Very good size (is large) and the clear hood meets with with kitty approval.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a good product - kitty took right to it. Now, she is fine with it. I have one small thing, and perhaps I will get better at it - but it is hard to get the 4 clips lined up to "snap" and lock into place. The seller did include 2 extra clips in the package - so it seems I can break two and still be OK. Rare to see a seller include a couple of spare parts, I do really like that. It is easy to clean, and the top comes off easily. "Locking" with the clips - takes a few tries - when lined up perfectly - they work fine. Overall 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: No more pee on the floor!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot bigger than I expected but it turns out it's absolutely perfect. Our cat isn't too smart and sometimes she pees outside the box because she doesn't know she's sticking her butt over the edge when she stands inside. This box is so big and deep that is impossible for her to miss once she's inside. No more pee all over the floor! Plus she can stand up and move around comfortably inside. I think she also likes that the cover is clear so she doesn't feel so trapped. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: erubi

customer_reviews.title: Love this litter box
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this litter box. One of my cats likes to dig like a maniac and it gets litter all over. This fixes that issue. I do have a litter mat underneath. But between the two, I rarely see litter on the floor now. The title says jumbo, but it looked small in the photos. It's not. It's large without being to big. Also, my cats LOVE to sit on top of it, haha. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erika B

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box was fine. Damaged. I can’t leave the house due to COVID Hawaii. Please refund my money or replace this box. I as already have 3 and they are great. With 6 cats I need an excellent product. I will let customers what happens. Tried 3 places to return this item as I was given only a code. I am in quarantine until 9/25. Please allow me to print a label. So IPS can pick up item.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great concept!
customer_reviews.text: This item didn't work out the way I thought it would. It was intended for our outdoor kitty; I wanted a place for him to go to the bathroom and be able to keep dry during the rainy season (yes, I SPOIL him), so I specifically wanted something that had a cover...he REFUSED to go near it! So, I ended up taking the top off and sliding the bottom portion under a bench and bought a bench cover and NOW he uses it...what we don't do for our animals!! Not the products fault that my cat is weird. It's a great concept if you don't have a neurotic cat :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tall
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that stands straight up when she pees and does not hunker down so that means she is peeing over the back or front in most boxes...so many with the lids leak when she pees on the edge...this is the biggest and the best that I have found so far...IF I was designing it, I would make it a couple inches taller all around but this is the best I've found. She is a rescue about eleven years old so we don't know her life before us...she will barely get in the litter box, so it might have some bad vibes for her...who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cat that used to miss the box
customer_reviews.text: I have a really big cat and she had a tendency to stand on the litter with her back end hanging over the edge. She's also a can can girl who kicks litter all over the place. With this box, keeping the litter down 2-3 inches has her completely in the box. The cover if perfect because she doesn't feel like she's in a cave and can kick litter all around without causing a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Western Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase - happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly love this litter box. It’s huge and my cats like the clear view part. The only two issues I have with it are the locks on the side - which I really just don’t even use anymore. It just sits on top just fine without messing with those. The other issue is that I really wish the top of it had a handle for removing and putting back on when cleaning. I am definitely glad I bought this though, I’m a big fan and so are my two cats!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Carney

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 2 adult cats !
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice looking. I like the shape and I like the colors it comes in. But it’s not even as big as the one I had purchased at the pet store. In fact it fit inside that old one. It’s adequate for maybe ONE large cat or 2 small kittens. If you have 2 or more cats? This is NOT big enough ! It’s needs to be at least 1/2 it’s size BIGGER if not twice as big. I’m not impressed. “ JUMBO “ it’s NOT
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Kitten
customer_reviews.text: We just adopted our first kitten. She is going through a phase were it's super fun to jump in and have a crazy party in the litter box. In her old box litter was getting everywhere!! We wanted to add a box with a lid that was also nice to look at. This is perfect for us. She still has crazy litter box parties because she's a weirdo but it has cut down so much on litter being everywhere. Definitely reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Jay. J.

customer_reviews.title: large enough for a few of my furbabies
customer_reviews.text: a friend gave me one of these to use and I loved it so much I ordered another one. Have a male cat that is 15 and for some reason wants to stand to pee--yes--over the edge of the regular boxes all over the tile floors this has been great for that one reason only. really need to order another one in the next few months and its easy to clean, doesnt have indentations in the bottom for litter to grab on to
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: After having bought this litter box a while ago, I think it is better than one without a cover, but there is still too much litter that the cats are able to push or drag out. I would not buy it again. It also takes a lot of litter to fill it to such a depth that the urin doesn't flow to the bottom and stick to it (wet) there. At least a whole 35 lb container.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent litter box for cats and me!
customer_reviews.text: I am now on cats 9 and 10. This is by far the best litter box I have ever used! It is large and roomy and the clear top lets the cats see if anything is approaching. My last 2 cats lived to be about 18 and I took the top off their litter boxes which were a different brand. Litter tracked everywhere! Being able to leave the top on also helps keep litter inside the box! I also like the opening is trimmed and not a rough edge. Great litter box! I have 3!
customer_reviews.author: debo

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the best litter box ever! I have tried so many boxes over the years. This one is big enough for my kitties to do their thing and move around without having to step in their business. The clear cover helps me see the kitties. The lid comes off easily and the box cleans nicely. I also like how deep the box is so the kitties keep everything inside. My only “complaint” is that the lid clips do not All snap shut but they work good enough. I also like that an extra clip in included.
customer_reviews.author: Gentledragon2

customer_reviews.title: The Purr-fectly Designed Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding litter box with well thought out features. The entry has a lined edge, so no sharp plastic edge and the size of the opening allows for easy scooping without having to remove the cover. The cover does, of course remove for changing the litter. The size is outstanding to give kitty plenty of room to turn around. This is a large capacity box, so plan on using more litter as it easily takes 10 lbs. There was no transition time, kitty walked right in and took care of her business. The best part is that everything stays in the box, thanks to the cover.
customer_reviews.author: ShellB

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I didnt like was the locking features just close and dont snap on all 4. On mine anyways. Not sure if that's a product or lock issue. It is locked but hard to tell when you have it locked because only 1 snaps locked. I would definitely order again as my kitty totally stopped kicking the litter out because she needed more space. This is a large one so they have the room some of them require to feel secure in their box.
customer_reviews.author: Kat D

customer_reviews.title: My house does not smell like litter anymore
customer_reviews.text: Its is really good litter box. Its perfect for my 8lbs elderly cat. Its not very tall so she can walk in, yet tall enough she can fit comfortably as she goes do her thing. It helps hold in the smell alot! My house used to stink every day and now with this litter box it helps alot. The only CON is that one of the clips came broken, like the platic broke, but i couldn’t return cause i needed the litter box ASAP and decided to keep it. But the broken clip does not interfere with putting the litter box together or whenever i need to clean it. I do like that it beongs extra clips just in case
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a couple of weeks now and it’s pretty great. It definitely helps prevent my “stander” from peeing over the top of the box (unless he’s aimed at the door which has only happened once). It’s also helped reduce the amount of litter scatter. The lid takes a little finesse to get latched but I feel like it’s secure when I get it on. A little disappointed that I was lured in by “7 color options” but only saw 2-3 (not that others were unavailable, just only showed 2-3 options). I do like the teal color I chose, though. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and a nice large size
customer_reviews.text: Well I received this litter box today and I must say it was worth the money just in the laughs it gave me. I have 6 cats and they have always had a covered box. They were so curious when I was setting it up. Then they took turns going in the box, not to do anything, and the others trying to get to the one who was inside through the transparent lid. Love this box. Very sturdy and a nice large size. Cats love it! I will be buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie K.

customer_reviews.title: Roomiest cat box, easy to clean, sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: And the cats (four) love the design. At least they have kept things in the right place. I have one with a poor spine, so she cannot get all the way down to urinate, and this box is big enough that she isn't aiming outside the box. I like that the top is a translucent plastic, it allows me to see who is doing what in case a sample for the vet is needed. Highly recommend; even though it is an expensive outlay at first, especially for two, it's the best cat box for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Quality should be better for such a high price.
customer_reviews.text: Size = 5 stars for sure, but overall quality - especially considering the expensive price tag - is pretty awful. If you're gonna charge $40+ for a litter box, at least make sure it's made well, & correctly at that. I do appreciate they sent spare locking mechanisms, because I had to use one of them immediately as it arrived with one broken off already. The lid doesn't fit as securely as it should because the whole thing is warped.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this! I have two cats I rescued after they were abandoned by their mother and their toilet habits were horrendous. I had two regular litter boxes set up in the garage and they would have contests to see which one could throw the most litter on the floor, so I bought the hooded cat litter box. It saves me a lot of sweeping, although the girls are still defiant and occasionally back up to the opening and wet the floor. My only suggestion for this product would be to mold a handle into the top to make taking it off more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for chunks
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great for this litter box with the exception of one of the locks gives me issues. I have to pull side where the lock is out so it can latch. There’s no damage to cause this so I assume it’s just a smidge off with the measurements. Nothing that stops me from using it. The litter box did come with 2 extra locks so that’s always handy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: BEST Litter Box We've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Makes Cleaning the Litter Box EASY !! BENEFITS: - The size is large to accommodate bigger cats - The lid is clear, which allows lots of light in for your cat, allows you to see if the box has been used, and allows you to scoop the litter box without removing the lid, because you can see what you are scooping! - The lid has a very large opening for big cats and your litter scoop! - The lid helps to contain odor - Keeps litter very well contained, minimal tracking out the front
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: 😊 Love it
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I have diggers. It’s so nice, and they don’t make them like this any more. Wicked easy to clean, and all my cats love it. I’m so glad I found it. this Is nice and sturdy, And I can see when it needs to be cleaned. So far so good. Big enough for me to get into and clean also. Will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: jewels2u

customer_reviews.title: Best litter Box on Market!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat who likes room to move around in and to also be able to see out and this litter box is perfect with it's clear lid and size. This box makes the second one that I have purchased and in the same color. It is deep, cats like to scratch and throw litter and not a piece gets on the floor or outside the box. Perfect for his use as he has never liked a small box which gave him little room to turn around and find the "right" spot to use but this box is big and perfect for his needs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: For Cats Who Like a View But Design Could be Better
customer_reviews.text: My cats prefer this to boxes that are opaque. However, where the 2 halves fit together is not liquid tight. It''s best to fill with about not much more than an inch of litter at a time, otherwise my cat's may stand too high in the box and tend to spray the seam. I wish they would redesign it, because otherwise it's a great box for larger cats, especially.
customer_reviews.author: M-in-Denver

customer_reviews.title: The best cat litter box ever
customer_reviews.text: This the absolute best cat litter box I have ever purchased. Attractive, contemporary styling. The clear top does not deter cats from entering and it seriously keeps litter tracking down. Generous size. I would recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Maslow

customer_reviews.title: Cats say "yes"
customer_reviews.text: My two stinkbombers are happy with these. Thankfully, the clear lid is high enough for an 18 pound cat to sit and not bump his head, which was the reason he would not use a covered litter box. These boxes are probably a bit expensive, but I've been looking for 3 years for a covered litter box my big fella would use, and to me, it's worth the oney.
customer_reviews.author: Catmom

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Roomy Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice litter box. It came with one of the latches missing, so I was unable to fasten the top to the bottom securely. However, Customer Service is excellent! They promptly sent a set of four new latches, and now all is well. It truly is quite large. In fact, it requires Super Jumbo liners (if you use liners, as I do, for easier litter changes). I would prefer that it have a handle on top, but I could see from the photo that it did not. I definitely recommend it, if you need a roomy litter box that you probably won't be carrying around anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Love how big the box is. My box doesn’t line up to lock very well but I loved with it. 3 months after having it I noticed the ammonia from the cat pee sinks into the plastic pores a lot more than my previous box. I had to deep clean and treat it several times now. Pretty color but next time I’ll buy a more durable box. I mean for 40$ it is not worth the price for cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lani A.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Box
customer_reviews.text: My girls (two adorable cats) were in need of a new litter box so I purchased this "jumbo" unit for them. They heard me changing out the box and when I was done one of them went to see what had happened. To my delight she immediately used the new box, a little while later the other one used it as well. Never sure how a cat will respond to new things. This is the best litter box I've owned, it's easy to clean, and seems to be pretty much odor free. It helps keep down the dust from the litter though soon I will be using a "dust free" kind of litter. Highly recommend this~~
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy cat lasy here! My 5 kitties can be pretty messy, so I have been trying out various litter boxes and none were very satisfactory. The onrs witha lid were dark inside, 3 of my cats apparently don't like pooping in the dark! Other boxes had too low of a rim ( I have a male cat who won't squat down low enough when peeing and you can imagine the mess) and no lid = litter dust everywhere! So this box with the transparent lid got me all excited. My kitties love them and so do I! No more messes!
customer_reviews.author: SIS

customer_reviews.title: Clear tops are cat approved
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same litter box for a long time & it has a clear top & every cat I had liked it. It was the biggest the store had at the time. I needed a new one to have upstairs & searched everywhere for one with a clear top. I found this one & when this company says jumbo size they mean it. It is huge! I included a pic of my old one beside this new one.
customer_reviews.author: trippind27

customer_reviews.title: Great except LEAKING problem
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 1. My two cats didnt require time to get used to it; BIG THANKS to the clear cover. 2. Pretty big, my 20 lbs cat seems like it. CONS: 1. The cover is big for the pan so it doesn't lock. The cover is sitting on top if the pan. So litter grains LEAK thru the gap between the cover and pan. Have pictures but how do I upload them...?? 2 stars off for this.
customer_reviews.author: ek

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $43
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this box for its clear cover. There aren't too many out there. That and its significant size are the positives. However, scooping is difficult, and the top not clear enough to be of any help. Plastic is fairly flimsy, and the clips just as flimsy. They even include an extra clip which speaks volumes on their reliability. For a $43 price point, it's being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much I want two
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best litter boxes I ever owned. I have a bigger cat - 15 pounds and this is a perfect size for him. I came back to buy a second one to put in a different area of my home and they're all gone! It's noted they don't know when or if, it will be back in stock. I certainly hope it comes back in. In the mean time, I'm searching elsewhere and hope to find one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barbett

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd box - I'll be buying a third!
customer_reviews.text: Really great! Litter well contained. Easy to see when you need to scoop. This is the second one I bought - I loved the first one so much! The first one was bought back about 5 months ago. I now have one in my bedroom and one in the living room. Still really easy to open, and the tabs stay secure. When I move to a bigger place I'll be buying this box again to put in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great large hooded litter box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice large hooded littler box. We have to use a hooded one because my dog has a habit of pulling out the crunchy tootsie rolls and eating them. Gross I know. The locking clips take a little fussing with sometimes but it’s not a huge deal. It’s so large that I can scoop without even needing to take the hood off. My kitty is making much less of a mess with this box since he’s not throwing litter all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rodkey

customer_reviews.title: Really jumbo
customer_reviews.text: I chose this litter box because of the jumbo size and of course color options. I chose the blue and teal. It definitely is large enough for our 2 hefty cats. The sides are nice and high and so far have not had litter flung out of the box. I like the clear lid. The only thing I did not like bwas that the top was hard to snap on the teal box. The top was not aligned well with the bottom on the teal box. The blue box. however, fit just right. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julieanna

customer_reviews.title: Best cat box I ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: The picture perhaps does not give credit enough how great this cat littler box is. I was quite surprised --it is so cheery bright yellow and it is very big and roomy. In addition, it is VERY easy to clean because the hood part snaps of with just 4 snaps. I am also quite impressed because it really keeps odor down. I have a large cat and she took to this cat box right away probably because she had ample room to turn around AND because the cover is see through. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: suzz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making an extra large litter pan. We have a BIG cat and for standard size pans she just couldn't always get her behind in. We have been using this one for several weeks and never has there been a problem. I did not put the lid on as I wanted her to take to it immediately and since I clean it several times a day, it is just easier to leave the lid off. I love this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Moon Lady

customer_reviews.title: My God the cats won't use the other litter box lol
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this because we had a really large nice litter box that simply was starting to stink. We did however keep one of their other boxes, a jump in box they seem to love and was still pretty new (aka no stink). I went to clean them 2 days of use and the old box had nothing in it while this new blue thing had more than I wanted to clean up. I had to laugh because the cats gave the rating, not me. I do like the clear lid, I can see if the box needs cleaning without having to peek inside.
customer_reviews.author: Katanajo

product_meta.title: Petphabet Covered Litter Box, Jumbo Hooded Cat Litter Box Holds Up to Two Small Cats Simultaneously,Extra Large
product_meta.description: Color:TealPetphabet Jumbo Hooded Cat Litter Box, Extra Large
feature_bullets: Petphabet Cat Litter Box ideal for Multiple Cat Households Even in A Studio Apartment .Two average sized cats could all sit in kitty litter boxes at the same time and have a synchronized poop fest in jumbo litter box
Removable & Clear Top Cover. high back and lid reduces spillover.Your cats won't feel closed in or like they could be blindly ambushed with litter box for cats
No Exploding Cat.Safe for cats to move around in cat litter boxes and for you to scoop or clean litter by having the color strip that fits over the opening
Roomy & Rounded. Dimension when assembled big cat litter box is 24.8"L x 20"W x 16.5"H. Door opening size 8.2 X 7.8 inches
Easy to Clean.Durable non-stick plastic covered litter box for easy clean-up

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
